snippet: Tina Maze, the World Cup overall leader, had a superb second run to win a giant slalom in Are, Sweden, on Friday for her third World Cup victory of the season and the 26th of her career.
abstract: Tina Maze wins women's world cup giant slalom in Are, Sweden; Marcel Hirscher wins men's event.
lead_paragraph: Tina Maze, the World Cup overall leader, had a superb second run to win a giant slalom in Are, Sweden, on Friday for her third World Cup victory of the season and the 26th of her career.

headline.main: Tina Maze Claims Giant Slalom in Sweden
headline.print_headline: Maze Claims Giant Slalom in Sweden
